channel.title: Help with 562 Client
channel.description:
[size=14pt]I want to add model's, GFX's and other doodles to my client but i'm not sure how to. There's not many tutorial's for loading item into 562 client's but can someone help me ?
I was also wondering if it's possible to make the client load a 600+ cache. Whic[/size]h I also find hard to find a tutorial.
Thanks :)
